main_content.main_text: Hi, I’m Nehan Zafar — a web developer passionate about building clean, responsive, and engaging web experiences.
main_content.sub_text: I am a passionate front-end developer with a strong focus on creating clean, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces. With a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I build modern web applications that are both visually appealing and functionally robust. I have experience working with frameworks like React, and I enjoy turning design concepts into interactive, accessible experiences. I'm constantly learning and keeping up with the latest trends in the web industry to ensure that the solutions I build are efficient, scalable, and aligned with current best practices.
main_content.mobileQuoteText: I'm passionate about crafting intuitive, visually engaging websites that blend design and development. I enjoy turning ideas into clean, responsive interfaces — combining creative design with solid, maintainable code to deliver smooth, user-focused experiences.

FAQ.Heading: Project Timeline
FAQ.Question: How long will it take to build my website?
FAQ.Answer: Think of a website like building a house — the more rooms (features) you want, the longer it takes! A simple site can be ready in a couple of weeks, while more complex ones can take a few months. I’ll keep you updated every step of the way so there are no surprises.

FAQ.Heading: Editing Your Own Website
FAQ.Question: Can I update the website myself after it’s done?
FAQ.Answer: absolutely! I’ll set it up so you can easily change text, images, and even add new pages without touching any scary code. And if you ever get stuck, I’m just a message away.

FAQ.Heading: Mobile-Friendly Design
FAQ.Question: Will my website look good on phones and tablets?
FAQ.Answer: Yes — I design everything to be ‘mobile-friendly’ from the start. That means your site will look just as sharp on a phone as it does on a big desktop screen. No squinting or awkward zooming required!
